title: Computer Freezes with League
body: My computer freezes randomly sometimes when I'm in a game of league but the catch is that it really doesn't freeze. I can still hear noise from league but the gameplay is frozen and if I press alt+tab I can see other screens while they move but I can't click them. In order to solve this I have to ctrl+alt+del and sign out then sign back in. Needless to say, I end up needing to re-login to league and now I've had to afk for 2-4 mins on my team. I would like to point out that I never freeze with any other game/application and I directly plug into the wall with an ethernet cable so it is not connection issues.

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  It sounds like your freeze might be a case of the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which auto-enabled for some players after an update and causing freezes like this.  Disabling it should fix it up.  Let me know!
I just looked and yea, it was on. I haven't freezed yet thankfully. Thanks
